<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Assign mounts to mount"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/mounts/{mount}/nodes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds nodes to the mount's many-to-many relation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"mount","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The mount ID","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"nodes":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["nodes"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
